title: AOPEN By Acer 20E0Q bi 19.5-inch Professional HD+ (1600 x 900) Monitor | 75Hz Refresh Rate | VESA Mountable Eye Protection: BlueLight Filter & Flickerless Technology (1 x HDMI & VGA Port)
description: AOPEN's 19.5 inch monitor with HD+ resolution delivers the incredible. Crisp colors come alive with the amazing 1600 x 900 resolution, allowing you to enjoy High-Definition entertainment in the comfort of your home. Enjoy smooth video playback with a rapid 6ms response time. Your eyes will stay strain-free thanks to AOPEN VisionCare’s array of eyeprotecting technologies. (UM.IE0AA.002)
